long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apple Game: A Fun and Engaging Puzzle Game

MAKE 10 

as many as possible!!!

Welcome to Apple Game, a simple yet highly engaging puzzle game designed to test and improve your focus and concentration!

Game Objective:
The goal of Apple Game is to remove apples from the board by selecting cells that add up to exactly 10. Each board is a grid of 5x8 cells, and each cell contains an apple marked with a random number from 1 to 9. Players must strategically select apples in straight lines or rectangles to sum their numbers to 10. Once selected, the apples disappear, earning you points.

How to Play:

* Start the Game
Click the "Start Game" button to begin. You will have 1 minute to score as many points as possible.
* Select Apples
Click on apples in straight lines or rectangles to select them. If the total sum of the selected apples equals 10, they disappear, and you score points.
* Strategize
Plan your moves carefully! The game requires both speed and strategy to maximize your score.
* End of Game
After 1 minute, the game will end, and you can see your final score. You also have the option to take a screenshot of your game board.
